column1: Ulmonan was the name (in early versions of the legendarium) of Ulmos mighty halls
column2: located in the Hidden Half of the Vaiya.
column7: 214The notion of Ulmos halls only appears in the earliest version of the legendarium
column8: where J.R.R. Tolkien often included more elaborate descriptions of the Valar than in his manuscripts of later years.

column1: Ulmonan is apparently a Qenya name; the first element is of course  Ulmo#Etymology
